title: AIMIM chief shares details of 32 coronavirus cured patients willing to donate plasma | Hindustan Times
content: Cautioning about the risks of using plasma therapy, ICMR further tweeted: “#COVID19 convalescent plasma therapy comes with its own share of technical challenges, like antibody titer testing. There are also several risks of using this therapy including life-threatening allergic reactions and lung injury.
